p: Escherichia coli strain ATCC25922 ( E. coli), fully susceptible to most antibiotics, was purchased from American Type Culture Collection (ATCC). Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus strain QC 5618 (MRSA) was provided as a Proficiency Program of Central Public Health Laboratory, Colindale, UK. Extended Spectrum Beta-Lactamase-producing E. coli strain MM1604 (ESBL) was provided as a Proficiency Program of Central Public Health Laboratory Service, Department of Health, Hong Kong.
